title: Silver Draven main looking for support
body:
Don't need to be good at support just willing to use voice communications I.E Skype and Curse.
I feel like I can carry if I have a support who is on the same page as me please add me if interested IGN is 619

replies.body:
hey man im currently s3 and love playing support
I added you if you have any interest just add me back
and we can see if we work together
